meta.job_title: Director of Institute for Classical Education

duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish professional development opportunities for academic leaders, school leaders, and teachers, and provide public outreach positioning the organization as a national leader in classical education.
Oversee the annual National Symposium for Classical Education (NSCE), create programming drawing upon scholars and practitioners, and produce newsletters and email communications.

Produce a robust annual report of the state of classical education in the United States, integrate with the Development Team to align fundraising efforts, and implement a constituent management cycle.
